mapper.insert: insert into FBS_KBK(KBK_MARKER_ID, KBK_ADMIN_ID, KBK_CODE, KBK_FULL_NAME, KBK_SHORT_NAME, KBK_EXPORT, KBK_START_DATE, KBK_END_DATE) values ( (SELECT KBK_MARKER_ID FROM FBS_KBK_MARKER WHERE UPPER(KBK_MARKER_NAME)=#{typeName}), (SELECT KBK_ADMIN_ID FROM FBS_KBK_ADMIN WHERE UPPER(KBK_ADMIN_NAME)=#{adminName}), #{code}, #{fullName}, #{shortName}, #{exported}, #{startYear}, #{endYear,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
